info.name: ZeresPluginLibrary
info.description: Gives other plugins utility functions and the ability to emulate v2.

changelog.title: New Stuff
items: Library will automagically reload dependent plugins.

changelog.title: Bugs Squashed
items: Fixed an issue with plugin updates on canary.
Listenable type can pass multiple arguments.
Tooltips stuck to the top of the screen.

changelog.title: Improvements
items: Allow synchronous script loading through promise.
Setting groups and panels can now have listeners -- callback uses setting and group id along with the value.

changelog.title: On-going
items: More classes and modules being added.
